mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_NUM, NOTICE_REGDATE, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CNT, NOTICE_IMG, NOTICE_HITCOUNT FROM NOTICE ORDER BY NOTICE_REGDATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (NOTICE_NUM, NOTICE_REGDATE, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CNT, NOTICE_IMG, NOTICE_HITCOUNT) VALUES (NOTICE_NUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, #{TITLE}, #{CONTENT}, #{IMG}, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_HITCOUNT = NVL(NOTICE_HITCOUNT, 0) + 1 WHERE NOTICE_NUM = #{NOTICE_NUM}
mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_NUM, NOTICE_REGDATE, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CNT, NOTICE_IMG, NOTICE_HITCOUNT FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_NUM=#{NOTICE_NUM}

SELECT NOTICE_NUM, NOTICE_REGDATE, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CNT, NOTICE_IMG, NOTICE_HITCOUNT FROM NOTICE WHERE
NOTICE_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{SearchKeyword} || '%'
NOTICE_CNT LIKE '%' || #{SearchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY NOTICE_REGDATE DESC
